mapper.select: select b.table_no, b.mem_id, b.field, b.board_title, b.board_content, b.board_regdate, b.board_count, h.ans_content, h.ans_id, h.ans_state, h.ans_date FROM board b LEFT OUTER JOIN hdboard_answer h ON b.table_no = h.table_no and b.mem_id = h.mem_id where b.field = '칭찬' order by table_no desc

SELECT b.table_no, b.mem_id, b.field, b.board_title, b.board_content, b.board_regdate, b.board_count, b.board_state, h.ans_content, h.ans_id, h.ans_state, h.ans_date FROM board b LEFT OUTER JOIN hdboard_answer h ON b.table_no = h.table_no AND b.mem_id = h.mem_id WHERE b.field = '칭찬' AND b.table_no = #{tableNo}
select count(table_no) from board where 1=1 and field = '칭찬'
